Package com.gensym.jgi

Interface Summary
G2Access This interface class provides the outbound methods required for accessing a connection to G2
G2Callbacks This interface class provides the inbound method callbacks from a connection to G2
G2Connection This interface class provides the inbound and outbound methods required for a connection to G2
G2ConnectionHandlerFactory This Interface defines a factory for handling incomming unsolicted (initiated from G2) connections from G2.
G2ConnectionListener A G2ConnectionListener is informed when any of the following events occur; The connected G2 has resumed.
G2ItemForJavaObjectFactory This interface is used by G2JavaStubController to enable external factories to return a G2 Item to associated for a specified java Object.
G2JavaStubClassReflectionProvider A G2JavaStubClassReflectionProvider provides data for G2 when it wishes to create stubs that represent Java Classes.
 

Class Summary
Designation Corresponds to a "thing of interest" in G2.
G2CommunicationErrorEvent An event raised when an asynchronous G2 communication error has occured.
G2ConnectionAdapter An empty implementation of G2ConnectionListener.
G2ConnectionEvent A event object that encapsulates information fired during a G2Connection event.
G2ConnectionInfo A Connection info object contains all the information necessary to get a handle on a specific instance of G2Access (actually G2Gateway).
G2Connector A G2Connector is a visual component Bean that provides the event and method interfaces of a G2Connection.
G2ConnectorBeanInfo  
G2Gateway This class provides a network interface to a GSI-INTERFACE object created within a connected G2.
G2Version A class that encapsulates the version for a product (currently G2 and GSI?).
RPCTrace  
 

Exception Summary
AttributeUncachableException  
ConnectionNotAliveException Signals that a problem has occured while attempting to access G2 via a G2Connection that is not alive.
ConnectionNotAvailableException Signals an attempt to access a G2 Connection that is not available or has not been created.
ConnectionTimedOutException Signals that a timeout occured with some connection.
DuplicateLocalRPCException Signals that a Local Java method can not be declared because a method of this name has already been predeclared
G2AccessException Signals that a problem has occured while accessing G2.
G2AccessInitiationException Signals that a problem has occured while attempting an initial connection to G2.
G2CallbacksException Signals that a problem has occured while executing a callback from G2 into java.
G2CommunicationException Signals that a G2 communication problem has occured.
G2ItemDeletedException An exception that is thrown whenever a deleted item is passed to G2 as an argument of an RPC call.
G2RemoteRPCNotPredeclaredException Signals that a Remote G2 RPC can not be called because the G2 procedure/method has not been predeclared using G2Gateway.declareRemoteRPC.
G2SecurityException Signals that the requested access to G2 is not valid from this class of access.
NoJavaMethodForG2RPCException Signals that a a Java method could not be found to invoke as a result of a G2 RPC.
TimeoutException Signals that a Timeout has occured during an Interface operation such as an RPC call.
 

Error Summary
G2GatewayNotInitializedError Signals that a G2Gateway can not continue an operation as it has not been initialized.
